name: Q. What does time slot mean?

acceptedAnswer.text: Time slots are set times when you can book our services. If you choose the time slot of 1-4pm, then our decorators will be coming to your location between 1pm to 2 pm and the decoration will be getting ready by 4pm.

name: Q. Can I customise the decoration according to my preference?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, we provide customizations based on your preferences. You can change balloon colours, add name and age foils, and more. You can directly mention the details on the last page before payment or simply reach out to us to discuss your specific requirements.

name: Q. Do you offer same-day decoration service?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, we offer same-day decoration service. It depends upon the slot availability and design selected by the customer. Please contact us to check slot availability.

name: Q. Do you only provide materials, or do you also decorate?

acceptedAnswer.text: We provide materials and also handle the decoration. Our team will come to your given location with all the materials and complete the decoration on-time.

name: Q. How much time do you take to setup the decoration?

acceptedAnswer.text: The time needed depends on factors like the decor's complexity and the venue size. Simple setups take 40-45 minutes, while larger installations may need 1-2 hours. We ensure timely and efficient setup for every event.
